source: TEXT_LUCKMB108_03309_SEQ_00<tab>Oul Sigun thirsts for your kindness.
target: TEXT_LUCKMB108_03309_SEQ_00<tab>リダ・ラーンのオール＝シグンは、冒険者に甘えたいようだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKMB108_03309_TODO_01<tab>Give the water to the leafmen.
TEXT_LUCKMB108_03309_OULSIGUN_000_000<tab>Mortal, mortal, hear my plea! Our precious children are thirsty, and I need you to bring them water.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMB108_03309_OULSIGUN_000_000ねえねえ、ワタシのことも手伝ってよ～。
大事な「草人」に、お水をあげなきゃいけないんだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKMB108_03309_OULSIGUN_000_001<tab>Who are our children, you ask? Why, they're the leafmen you see standing about our village. Adorable, aren't they?
target:
TEXT_LUCKMB108_03309_OULSIGUN_000_001「草人」っていうのは、
そこにいるような、葉っぱだらけの子たちのことだよ。
とってもかわいいでしょ～？

source: TEXT_LUCKMB108_03309_OULSIGUN_000_002<tab>Now, you'll need to go to Longmirror Lake to draw the water. Once you have it, see that our children have a good drenching.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMB108_03309_OULSIGUN_000_002特別に、何となく場所が掴めるようにしてあげるから、
「姿見の湖」まで行って水を汲んで、
草人たちにかけてあげてね。

source: TEXT_LUCKMB108_03309_OULSIGUN_000_003<tab>Oh, but be warned: the Fuath make their home in the lake. They tend to play rough, so have care!
target:
TEXT_LUCKMB108_03309_OULSIGUN_000_003……あ、水辺といえば、
いじわるなフーア族の領分だから、気をつけてねぇ～。

source: TEXT_LUCKMB108_03309_OULSIGUN_000_010<tab>They may look alike to strangers, but to us each of our children is unique and special!
target:
TEXT_LUCKMB108_03309_OULSIGUN_000_010草人たちにも、結構個性があるんだよ。
かわいいよねぇ～。

source: TEXT_LUCKMB108_03309_BALLOON_000_021<tab>You want water? We'll give you a lungful!
TEXT_LUCKMB108_03309_OULSIGUN_000_030<tab>You've given water to our children? Thank you ever so much!
target:
TEXT_LUCKMB108_03309_OULSIGUN_000_030あ～、草人にお水をあげてくれたんだねぇ！
どうもありがと～！

source: TEXT_LUCKMB108_03309_OULSIGUN_000_031<tab>They're all very dear to us. They wandered into Il Mheg as stray mortals, but we grew attached to them and decided to take them in.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMB108_03309_OULSIGUN_000_031うふふ、みんなかわいかったでしょ～？
あれはね、イル・メグに入り込んできたヒトたちなんだ。
帰っちゃうと寂しいから、ワタシたちが形を変えたの～。

source: TEXT_LUCKMB108_03309_OULSIGUN_000_032<tab>You and yours would've been our children too, but the enchantment didn't catch as well as we'd hoped. It's never too late of course...
target:
TEXT_LUCKMB108_03309_OULSIGUN_000_032……アナタも、最初にもっと深く術にかかってくれたら、
かわいい草人にできたんだけどなぁ。
残念だよぅ……。
